name: PCSX2
notes:
Una vez creado el Prefix o Unidad Virtual cambias la direccion del ejecutable y del directorio de trabajo en la configuraciòn debido a que casi a diario sacan una 
nueva versiòn. Ej: 
drive_c/Program Files/PCSX2 1.5.0/pcsx2.exe >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
drive_c/Program Files/pcsx2-v1.5.0-dev-3311-g3c38087e7-windows-x86/pcsx2.exe
content:
files:
- dark: N/A:Select setup exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/PCSX2 1.5.0/pcsx2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/PCSX2 1.5.0/
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx11_42
    description: Installing DirectX 11
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx11_43
    description: Installing DirectX 11
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_42
    description: Installing d3dcompiler42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Installing d3dcompiler43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    description: Installing d3dcompiler47
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
